Summary: Falling on fire in 45 degree pie shape fell behind mountian made no sounds
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Daly City
There were no other sightings in Daly City on or around July 12th 1976
divs: Sighting DetailsWas stop at a red lite in my car at nite.Then the upper right hand corner of the window lites up as the pie shape craft falls to earth on fire. Behind the san Bruno Mountians it looked like it was the size of a house.The saucer shape was broken like a large piece of pie and falling sideways on fire in the center.I roll down the window of my car to see if I could hear the saucer fall to earth I was surprised that I did not near anything.Was surprised to hear on the local news that what I had seen was reported as a fireball.
